data.title: Oculus Quest vs. Oculus Rift S: Spec comparison
data.text: The Oculus Rift S, Facebook's PC-connected headset, was announced at GDC 2019, following the announcement of the company's standalone headset, the Oculus Quest.

data.title: Here's What to Expect (and Hope For) From the Oculus Quest
data.text: Facebook's most important headset yet will hit the shelves soon.

data.title: This is how Facebook kills its competition
data.text: CNN's Jon Sarlin explores the different ways that the social media giant has kept competitors at bay — and why that could now spell trouble.

data.title: MarketWatch First Take: Facebook crumbles around its lonely king
data.text: Mark Zuckerberg, the co-founder and chief executive of Facebook Inc., seems increasingly alone at the top of his company with the departure of two key executives last week, after his privacy pivot.
